subtitle: Find your way through the performance optimization maze!

fail.unverified: The exercise doesn't seem to have a verified solution!

DEFER ALL THE THINGS.empty: Hey, you're not supposed to just remove all the <script> tags!
DEFER ALL THE THINGS.dupe: You shouldn't load the same script more than once, why not squish them into one <script>?
DEFER ALL THE THINGS.body: Script should be in the <body>, scripts in <head> will block rendering!
DEFER ALL THE THINGS.bottom: Script should be at the bottom of the page
